mapper.select: SELECT lk.likeId as likeId, b.boardNm as boardNm, b.boardId as boardId, cc.cateNm as cateNm, c.contentId as contentId, c.contentNm as contentNm, lk.regDt as regDt, r.rentalStat as rentalStat FROM ( SELECT l.likeId as likeId, l.contentId as contentId, l.regDt as regDt FROM `Like` l WHERE l.likeUserId = #{userId} and l.delYn = 'N') lk LEFT JOIN Content c ON c.contentId = lk.contentId LEFT JOIN Board b ON b.boardId = c.boardId LEFT JOIN ContentCategory cc ON cc.cateId = c.cateId LEFT JOIN Rental r ON r.contentId = c.contentId ORDER BY regDt DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `Like` l WHERE l.contentId = ${contentId}
